channel.title: Pickup Glitch
channel.description:
Ok I was wondering if theres a way to fix a "pickup" glitch on Deltascape source. Im not a coder,but if u are a coder,and can fix that,ill HIGHLY appreciate it. My msn is Superlapie@hotmail.com Add me there and talk to me about it. Please dont post if you're gonna say "ill do it for money" if so ill just report it as spam.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CnmyFfofo0k <---- thats video of me showing you the pickup glitch (sorry that its low quality i rushed it)

item.title: Pickup Glitch
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I suggest using a backup of the server, and then add the things you did again, you can then find out what is wrong with the npc drops, but as soulcist said your npc masks are messed up and that could be a contributing factor to why drops don’t work correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Glitch
item.dc:creator: @souph souph
item.description:
@souph wrote:

go make a devo team

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Please bare with me; I’m only trying here.

Though, it might have something with the Npc update mask or something. The models are corrupted I can see that much.

I would of thought that its because Npcdrops aren’t added to the server. Then again since you said this is happening as well with Player Killing. Then obviously it’s not Npcdrops; so I’m not positive on this one.

You could I suppose try to correct the Models, and Ints for the Npcs.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Glitch
item.dc:creator: @lapie000 lapie000
item.description:
@lapie000 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:363932”]That looks like its the Boss. Does this happen for every NPC?[/quote] not every npc,but almost all,and it happens to ANYTHING in wildy… so that leads to horrible pking,as u cant loot you’re opps gear =\

Read full topic
